segments.text: Yes , I do it a lot.but I don't like doing dishes.what about you , do you like cooking and then cleaning up afterwards ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To be honest , I don't really like doing either one , I can't cook and I hate cleaning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Suppose you have to do one of the two , which do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would rather do the dishes than cook .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer the absent.the way I see it , to do the dishes is boring .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to buy some vegetable and you cook .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you do the dishes after the meal ?
segments.speaker: S2
